overview: Welcome to our heaven on earth, the universal brotherhood of mansex. Sick Fucks is a series of initiations pulled from bathhouses, motels and satanic halls. The goal: to lay bare man's dark desires. It doesn't get more real and raw than this. So sit back, saddle up, and prepare to be changed. Look deep into this abyss and you'll find your real self staring back with a depraved grin on his face.
title: Sick Fucks
